item.title: Reviving Tshowongpoktor: A vision of integrated commercial farming in Trashigang
item.description: Trashigang—In the verdant hills of Darjayling, Yangnyer gewog, Trashigang, a remarkable transformation is unfolding. Once a neglected expanse, the 14.3-acre Tshowongpoktor land is now blossoming into a hub of integrated commercial farming.
